sourcesContent:
import React, {useRef, useState} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import {Container, Row , Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from './../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef('') const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null) // thi is an static data later we will call out api const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id ===id) // destructure proprties tour objeccct const {photo, title, desc, price,address, reviews,city,distance, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); // format date const options = {day:'numeric', month:'long', year:'numeric'} return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating } {totalRating === 0 ?( 'not rated' ) :( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* {=========================== tour reviws Section==================} */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
kofi

{new Date('01-18-2023').toLocaleDateString("en-us",options )}

5
Amazing Tour
) )}
{/* {=========================== tour reviws Section end ==================} */}
}; export default TourDetails
